summary:
NudistSkyrim - Everyone is naked!

This mods simply removes all outfits from the NPCs. It does not contains nudity by itself, but is intended to be used alongside nudity mods.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]= NudistSkyrim - Everyone is naked! =[/size]
[size=4]
== News ==
[size=2]
Video: I have just added a video (NSFW) which looks like nudist Skyrim with real people.
Images: I have't added in-game images yet because it all depends on the body mods you have installed.
[/size]
== Installation instructions ==[/size]

Just copy the file NudistSkyrim.esp to your Skyrim\Data folder.

[size=4]== Description ==[/size]

This mods simply removes all outfits from the NPCs. To have a true Nudist Skyrim world, you will have to install some other mods:

- Nude female meshes and textures (so women can get rid of their underwear)
    - I'm currently using CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling
    ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888[/url])
- Nude male meshes and textures (so men can get rid of their underwear)
    - I'm currently using Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
    ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488[/url])
- No naked comments (so that everybody forgets that they used to wear clothes)
    - No Naked Comments by Migal
    ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13050]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13050[/url])
- And finally [i][b]this mod[/b][/i] so that everybody is naked by default

    - Similar mods:
        - UNP naked armor by keljarn
        ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27148]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27148[/url])
        - CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Naked Armor by nbkyrww
        ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27415]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27415[/url])
        - A Naked World
        ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64064/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64064[/url])

You will be able to equip clothes and armor that you find in dressers and wardrobes. But others could think you are a weirdo. Why are you wearing clothes when everybody goes naked just fine? What's wrong with you?
author: dino80
